name: ShowHiddenChannels
author: JustOptimize (Oggetto)
description: A plugin which displays all hidden Channels and allows users to view information about them, this won't allow you to read them (impossible).

changelog.title: v0.6.2 - Fix Hidden Channel Page
items: Fixed the hidden channel page making discord crash due to the new Discord update.

changelog.title: v0.6.1 - Fix channel icon
items: Fixed channel icon missing module due to the new Discord update.

changelog.title: v0.6.0 - Standalone
items: Switched to BdApi.Net for fetching data.
Stopped using ZeresPluginLibrary, now the plugin is standalone.
Added a custom logger (now the console looks pretty)
Edited the updater to fetch the file from the releases and not from the tags
